title: Philip K. Dick - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/26/19
itunes:title: Philip K. Dick - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/26/19
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and journalist Erik Davis discuss his research into the life of the famous science fiction author Philip K. Dick, and how his experiences with psychedelic drugs impacted his stories.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
